traits.cross_boundary_encounter: Meets Jesus at Jacob’s well in Samaria, where Jesus crosses ethnic and gender boundaries by asking her for a drink.
traits.living_water_discourse: Engages in a dialogue about living water, moving from literal misunderstanding to a deeper discussion of eternal life and worship.
traits.life_revelation: Jesus reveals knowledge of her complex marital history, leading her to perceive him as a prophet.
traits.worship_in_spirit_and_truth: Receives teaching about worshiping the Father in spirit and truth that transcends Jerusalem–Gerizim debates.
traits.witness_to_town: Leaves her jar, goes to the town, and invites others to come see a man who told her everything she ever did, leading many Samaritans to believe.
traits.narrative_profile: Functions as a paradigmatic figure whose honest questioning and testimony model the movement from outsider status to authentic witness.
